items.strItemDescription: A cape of darkness, woven through with icy metal for protection. Forged for this 2013's Black Friday warriors!
A helm to make the dark warrior, Sepulchure, proud. Forged in honor of the warriors who braved Black Friday, 2013.
The dark metal of this helm is cold to the touch. Forged for the warriors who braved Black Friday, 2013!
Only a few of these types of helms have been recovered from the endless Sandsea. Forged for the warriors who braved Black Friday, 2013!
Discovered in the depths of a frozen cave, the Frostcythe has been reforged in darkness for Black Friday, 2013!
A weapon stolen from the Rose and reforged in darkness for Black Friday, 2013!
The weapon of a DragonLord who has embraced darkness! A weapon for a dark warrior on Black Friday, 2013!
These dark wings were once used solely by Sek-Duat's enforcers. Forged anew for this 2013's Black Friday warriors!
A weapon stolen from the Rose and reforged in darkness for Black Friday, 2013!
